sub_title: Video strategist and consultant. AV Specialist, Multi-camera director and creative imaging expert
summary: With over 27 years of experience in the media and entertainment industry, my journey has been fun and at times even thrilling! With a treasure trove of experiences that have not only shaped my life but also honed my professional skills. I'm a firm believer in broadening one's horizons and acquiring a wide range of experiences to increase one's knowledge base to ultimately become a more informed decision-maker. My career decisions have been dynamic and sometimes even adventurous, enabling me to gain experience in many aspects of the production process. And allowing me to become a versatile and practical partner to any production process. Please allow my expertise and no nonsense approach benefit your next project.
